SELECT sp.splr_no ,sp.splr_name ,sp.splr_tel ,sp.splr_mng ,sp.splr_hp ,sp.splr_zip ,sp.bk_cd ,dc.detail_name AS bk_name ,sp.splr_acc ,sp.splr_add ,sp.splr_add_dt ,sp.splr_indst ,sp.splr_indst_no ,sp.splr_memo ,sp.splr_email FROM tb_splr sp INNER JOIN tb_detail_code dc ON dc.group_code = 'bk_cd' AND dc.detail_code = sp.bk_cd
and sp.splr_name Like CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%')
and sp.splr_indst_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%')
and ( sp.splr_name Like CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%') or sp.splr_indst_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%') )
ORDER BY sp.splr_no LIMIT #{pageindex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_splr sp INNER JOIN tb_detail_code dc ON dc.group_code = 'bk_cd' AND dc.detail_code = sp.bk_cd
and sp.splr_name Like CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%')
and sp.splr_indst_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%')
and ( sp.splr_name Like CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%') or sp.splr_indst_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sname}, '%') )

SELECT sp.splr_no ,sp.splr_name ,sp.splr_tel ,sp.splr_mng ,sp.splr_hp ,sp.splr_zip ,sp.bk_cd ,dc.detail_name AS bk_name ,sp.splr_acc ,sp.splr_add ,sp.splr_add_dt ,sp.splr_indst ,sp.splr_indst_no ,sp.splr_memo ,sp.splr_email FROM tb_splr sp INNER JOIN tb_detail_code dc ON dc.group_code = 'bk_cd' AND dc.detail_code = sp.bk_cd WHERE sp.splr_no = #{splr_no}
